markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Improved Familiar (Familiar Master)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1973) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 174 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Familiar Master](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=60)

**Prerequisites**
[Familiar Master Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1970)

</column>

---

You find it easy to attract a powerful and unusual familiar to your side. The number of abilities required to make your familiar a [specific familiar](/familiars/specific-familiars) is two lower than normal.
name: Improved Familiar (Familiar Master)
